name: Single-arm Preacher Curl
how_to_perform:
1. Hold the preacher curl bar with one arm, grip firm and shoulder-width apart.
2. Sit on the bench with your back against the pad, allowing your arm to rest across the curling surface.
3. Keep your back straight and core engaged throughout the exercise.
4. Squeeze your shoulder blades together and pull your arm towards your chest, keeping control over the weight.
5. Slowly lengthen your arm by lowering it back down to the starting position, maintaining a controlled motion.
6. Repeat on the opposite arm.
short_summary: Single-arm preacher curl targets the biceps in isolation.
